name: VGDC Byte-Sized Bonanza
description:
Description

VGDC Byte-Sized Bonanza is a collection of minigames developed by our members in the Fall 2019 semester. Experience an alien version of golf, gravity-manipulating guns, and explosive white capsules in this fun mix of projects.

This game is a collection of minigames developed by our members in the Fall 2019 semester.

Game Instructions
  • Use your mouse to select a game from the menu
  • Controls for each game will be shown in-game
